list.title: annotationCreatorMatches
list.description: Matches an annotation's creator URI against a list of URIs (e.g. from a user).

list.title: annotationCreatorName
list.description: Returns the craetor name for an annotation.

list.title: annotationCreatorUri
list.description: Returns the creator URI for an annotation.

list.title: compareFunctions
list.description:
An object of compare functions (can be used by array.sort for example).

TODO: Add more functions.

list.title: definition
list.description: Returns the definition of a JSKOS Item as an array. If there is no definition, an empty array will be returned.

list.title: getLanguages
list.description: Get the preference list either from store or from defaults (fallback)

list.title: isValidUri
list.description: Checks whether a string is a valid URI.

list.title: languageMapContent
list.description: Returns the content of a language map for a JSKOS Item.

list.title: mappingRegistryIsStored
list.description: Returns whether a mapping registry has stored mappings (true = database) or not (false = recommendations).

list.title: normalize
list.description:
Applies recursive unicode normalization to data.

  • If data is an array, it will recursively normalize all elements of that array.
  • If data is an object, it will recursively normalize all property values of that object.
  • If data is a string, it will apply unicode normalization to that string.
  • If data is of any other type, it will be returned as is.

list.title: notation
list.description: Returns the primary notation for a JSKOS Item. If there is no notation, it will return an empty string. Scheme notations will be uppercased.

list.title: prefLabel
list.description: Returns the prefLabel of a JSKOS Item. If there is no label, it will return the URI. If there is no URI, it will return an empty string.

list.title: selectLanguage
list.description: Selects a language tag from a language map or null if no language was found.

list.title: userOwnsMapping
list.description: Returns true if the user owns the mapping (i.e. is first creator), false if not.
